capabilities.name: pg_read_mindmap_json
capabilities.description: Reads the content of a Project Graph JSON file as a string. Useful for viewing the raw data.

capabilities.name: pg_add_mindmap_node_json
capabilities.description: Adds a new node (Text, Image, Section, etc.) to a Project Graph JSON file.

capabilities.name: pg_edit_mindmap_node_json
capabilities.description: Edits properties of an existing node in a Project Graph JSON file, identified by its UUID.
